title: Did you publish 58 scientific papers in 2017 that say global warming is a myth?
subtitle: An article in Breitbart News used flawed interpretations of a blog questioning the climate to inflate a blatantly inaccurate understanding of climate research.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A total of 58 peer-reviewed papers published in the first half of 2017 conclude that global warming is a myth.
